B

BinarySearchTree - Class in Unnamed Package
Binary Search Tree Class Sorts through entries of text files and places into a binary tree structure Compiled from existing binary search trees on the internet

C

compareTo(Account) - Method in class Account
The compareTo method uses ASCII comparison to compare two strings It returns 0 if the strings are identical, <0 if the first is 'smaller' than the second and >0 if the first is greater than the second.
